sentences.en: a spacious room with wall-to-wall carpeting
sentences.cn: 整个地板铺上地毯的宽敞房间

sentences.en: Carpeting is a reasonably cheap floor-covering.
sentences.cn: 地毯的料子是价格公道低廉的铺地面料。

sentences.en: ELAINE: I don't know, who to rune for, George's place has carpeting.
sentences.cn: 依莲: 不知道, 我该去哪家呢?乔治的住处有地毯.

sentences.en: I was surprised at the plush red carpeting and comfortable chairs.
sentences.cn: 我对华美的红地毯和舒适的椅子感到惊讶.

sentences.en: Judging from the current bout of red - carpeting, most celebrities have nothing add.
sentences.cn: 而从目前的红毯着装来看, 大多数明星穿的都没什么新意.

sentences.en: My heel wore through the carpeting beneath the accelerator of my car.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋跟把我的汽车里加速器下面的地毯磨穿了.
房内铺满地毯的新办公室

sentences.en: One says the carpeting, which is wet all the time, looks " nasty. "
sentences.cn: 说那张地毯整天都湿漉漉的, 看起来 “ 恶心死了 ”.

sentences.en: Our apartmentis deluxe furnished with wall - to - wall carpeting and brand new furniture.
sentences.cn: 我们的公寓装潢考究,配有全新家具,而且全部铺设地毯.

sentences.en: Ours are deluxe furnished apartments with wall - to - wall carpeting and brandnew dishwashers.
sentences.cn: 我们的公寓装潢豪华,地面全部铺地毯,还有全新的洗碗机.
山姆: 换地毯 吗 ?

sentences.en: Save money on carpeting by gluing a square of carpet onto each shoe.
sentences.cn: 不要买地毯,把小块的地毯用胶水粘在鞋底.

sentences.en: She looked crestfallen and gazed at the parlour carpeting.
sentences.cn: 她看起来心灰意懒了,眼睛只盯着会客室的地毯.

sentences.en: Stop carpeting him, he already realized that he made a big mistake.
sentences.cn: 不要再训斥他了, 他已经意识到犯了个大错误了.

sentences.en: The carpeting for the entrance lobby needs to be renewed.
sentences.cn: 大厅入口处的地毯需要更换.

sentences.en: The carpeting had been ripped away by the previous owners.
sentences.cn: 毛毯已经被之前的主人弄掉了.

phrases.tran_cn: n. （《一千零一夜》中载人飞行的）魔毯；幻想中的神奇无比的交通工具
（迎接贵宾用的）红地毯；隆重的接待

trans.tran_en: carpets in general, or the material used for making them
